sentence.Network_en: Jenny is a well - experienced expositor.
sentence.Network_cn: 珍妮是一位很有经验的解说员.

sentence.Network_en: Friedrich von Hayek is the most eloquent expositor of the market as a process of discovery.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗雷德里希?冯?哈耶克(FriedrichvonHayek)是市场作为发现过程的最雄辩阐述者.

sentence.Network_en: Among Biblical critics a tralatitious interpretation is one received by expositor from expositor.
sentence.Network_cn: 在圣经评论家中,比喻解释是一种被不同的评注者接受的解释.

对法律的主题发表意见的人可分为两类：解释者（Expositor）和评论者(Censor)。解释者的任务是向我们说明他所识别的法律是什么…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French or late Latin, from Latin exposit- 'exposed, explained', from exponere (see expound)
